description: Try our easy to follow Vegan Peanut Butter Cups recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Vegan Peanut Butter Cups Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: For chocolate top, place 1/2 cup natural peanut butter and 3 tbs coconut oil in a microwavesafe bowl and microwave for 30 seconds. Add 3tbs cocoa and 2tbs maple syrup and stir to combine. Divide amongst cupcake liners and top with extra roasted peanuts and sea salt flakes. Place in the freezer to set (about one hour). Serve straight from the freezer. Note: While every care has been taken to ensure this recipes is vegan, always check labels as ingredients differ from brand to brand.

For chocolate top, place 1/2 cup natural peanut butter and 3 tbs coconut oil in a microwavesafe bowl and microwave for 30 seconds. Add 3tbs cocoa and 2tbs maple syrup and stir to combine. Divide amongst cupcake liners and top with extra roasted peanuts and sea salt flakes. Place in the freezer to set (about one hour). Serve straight from the freezer. Note: While every care has been taken to ensure this recipes is vegan, always check labels as ingredients differ from brand to brand.
